table(HSMM$State,HSMM$orig.ident)
Cellratio <- prop.table(table(HSMM$State,HSMM$orig.ident), margin = 2)
Cellratio
Cellratio <- as.data.frame(Cellratio)
colourCount = length(unique(Cellratio$Var1))
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(Cellratio) + geom_bar(aes(x =Var2, y= Freq, fill = Var1),stat = "identity",width = 0.7,size = 0.5,colour = '#222222')+ 
  theme_classic() +
  #facet_grid(geom_bar$orig.ident~.,scales = "free_y")+
  labs(x='State',y = 'Ratio')+
  coord_flip()+
  theme(panel.border = element_rect(fill=NA,color="black", size=0.5, linetype="solid"))
